8 void FODDetector::clusterPossibleFODs(PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud,
9  std::vector<pcl::PointIndices> &cluster_indices)
10 {
11  pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>::Ptr tree(new pcl::search::KdTree<pcl::PointXYZRGB>);
12  tree->setInputCloud(cloud);
13 
14  pcl::EuclideanClusterExtraction<pcl::PointXYZRGB> ec;
15  ec.setClusterTolerance(_voxel_resolution);
16  ec.setMinClusterSize(100);
17  ec.setMaxClusterSize(1000);
18  ec.setSearchMethod(tree);
19  ec.setInputCloud(cloud);
20  ec.extract(cluster_indices);
21 }
22 
23 int FODDetector::clusterIndicesToROSMsg(const std::vector<pcl::PointIndices> &cluster_indices,
24  PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud,
25  std::vector<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2> &cluster_msg_array)
26 {
27  int n_fods=0;
28  for (std::vector<pcl::PointIndices>::const_iterator it = cluster_indices.begin(); it != cluster_indices.end(); ++it)
29  {
30  PointCloudRGB::Ptr cloud_cluster(new PointCloudRGB);
31  for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator pit = it->indices.begin(); pit != it->indices.end(); ++pit)
32  cloud_cluster->points.push_back(cloud->points[*pit]); //*
33  cloud_cluster->width = cloud_cluster->points.size();
34  cloud_cluster->height = 1;
35  cloud_cluster->is_dense = true;
36 
37  std::string cluster_name = "/fod"+std::to_string(n_fods);
38  n_fods++;
39 
40  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 cluster_msg;
41  pcl::toROSMsg(*cloud_cluster,cluster_msg);
42  cluster_msg.header.frame_id = Utils::_frame_id;
43  cluster_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
44  cluster_msg_array.push_back(cluster_msg);
45  }
46  return n_fods;
47 }
